file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-12-02-04 - APU CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to remove/install the APU control module. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 26-12-02-000-801-A APU CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL APU CONTROL MODULE - INSTALLA- ALL 26-12-02-400-801-A TION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-12-02 Page 1 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-12-02-000-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU CONTROL MODULE - REMOVAL A. General (1) This section gives the procedures to remove the APU control module. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223JLW LH - cockpit lateral console 223 223KLW LH - cockpit lateral console D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breaker below and attach a DO-NOT- CLOSE tag to it: • APU FIRE DET. (2) Open access panels 223JLW and 223KLW for the APU control module removal ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). J. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Disconnect the electrical connector. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-12-02 Page 2 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (2) Remove the screws and the washers. (3) Remove the APU control module. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-12-02 Page 3 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY:: ALL APU Control Module - Removal/Installation Figure 401 ZONES 223 A DET. A B C DET. C APU CONTROL MODULE ELECTRICAL CONNECTOR DET. B 145AMM260052.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-801-A/400 26-12-02 Page 4 of 6 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-12-02-400-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. APU CONTROL MODULE - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This section gives the procedures to install the APU control module. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM MPP 06-41-03/100 - COMPONENT LOCATION AMM TASK 26-10-00-700-801-A/500 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 223 223JLW LH - cockpit lateral console 223 223KLW LH - cockpit lateral console D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Cockpit I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Make sure that, on the circuit breaker panel, the circuit breaker below is open and safetied: • APU FIRE DET. J. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Put the APU control module in the installation position. (2) Install the washers and the screws. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 26-12-02 Page 5 of 6 Rev 50 - Apr 29/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Connect the electrical connector. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Close the access panels 223JLW and 223KLW after APU control module installation ( AMM MPP 06-41-03/100). (2) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breaker below and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from it: • APU FIRE DET. SUBTASK 710-002-A (3) Do an operational test of the fire detection system (AMM TASK 26-10-00-700-801-A/ 500). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 400-801-A/400 26-12-02 Page 6 of 6 Rev 50 - Apr 29/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
